html: Mountain of Sion, a figure of the Church, and of heaven. The Jews shall feast: yea, some of all nations shall partake of the blessed Eucharist, and obtain heaven. The expressions are too grand for a corruptible feast. (Calmet)— Wine. Literally, "of vintage," (Haydock) on which occasion great rejoicings were made. (Hesiod, Hercul. 297.)— Protestants, "of wines on the lees." (Haydock)— In the East, the wines were very thick, Psalm lxxv. 9. (Calmet)— On the rejection of the Jews, the Gentiles were converted. (Worthington)
